Learning-outcomes.item: Use the Visual Studio IDE environment
Declare and use various data types in the VB environment.
Properly use the different looping structures available in VB.
Write an amortization schedule or the future value of monthly investment program to demonstrate the capabilities of looping.
Write programs involving single and multi-dimensional arrays.
Write object based programs showing proper use of inheritance and polymorphism.
Write programs using sequential access and random access file structures.
